original_title: New York Film Diary Sep. 3, 1994 - Oct. 3 1995
overview: "During the 13 months, I spent in New York, I always had my camera with me. This film concentrates on direct visual impressions of my daily life in New York. It is a sketchbook more than a documentation of my life. New York Film Diary is a very personal, silent inventory of what I saw, of what attracted my attention there." (MG)
title: New York Film Diary Sep. 3, 1994 - Oct. 3 1995
